name: KeepItAlive
description:
Help the old man fix the water pump.

Click to walk and click to interact with objects.

This game was made for GDGT's Independence Day Jam 2016.

First version was the one submitted for the jam, it has bugs that makes it impossible to finish the game. The second version includes fixes for the game breaking bugs so you can finish the game.

Thank you very much for playing :)
